content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Ms. Abbasi. I'm sure you will find it quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I am a student so I don't have much money. I can pay 400 euros per month.
[[/manager]]
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that offer is much lower than what I'm looking for. The location of the apartment and its amenities justify a higher price. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location and amenities are great. However, I am a student and I can't afford more than 450 euros per month. I hope this is a price that you can consider.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While 450 euros is still below my expectations, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. If you can guarantee a long-term lease, perhaps we can come to an agreement. How long are you planning to stay in Munich?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I plan to stay in Munich for the next four years. I am a responsible and dependable person, and I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Four years is an excellent commitment, and it's reassuring to hear that you're dependable. Let's aim for a price that reflects the value of the apartment and your long-term lease. How does 500 euros per month sound to you? It's a fair price considering the location and the stability of the lease.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer. I agree to the price of 500 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Welcome to your new home! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
